item.title: How to Write Dockerfile to Reduce Size and Build Time of Docker Images
item.description: For the past couple of years, I have been creating Dockerfile for different projects. based on those experiences I am going to share some tips on writing docker files to communication between containers. _FYI: before reading this article, please read the article from official docker blog site to learn about best practices for creating Dockerfile.
